fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 70.55 points or 0.37% to settle at 18,755.45. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rallied 3.55% to 11.23. Adani Enterprises, HDFC Bank and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The June 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 June 2023.
